name: Granny Rush - The Temple Mine Escape
name_original: Granny Rush - The Temple Mine Escape
description:
Granny Rush is the ultimate in cool track racing fun. Leap aboard a crazy mine cart and hurl Granny and friends through the Mine caverns. Watch out! Granny's coming up the rear, she's got the gold and she's not stopping for anyone.

"WOW WOW, I just love it!!" - Over 50,000 players already racing Granny in this roller coaster thrill ride.

Stage the greatest escape ever in this Super fast extreme racing mayhem with all the gold stashed in your mine cart. Launch your Hero down crazy Cavern tracks collecting the gold as you go.

Check out the other cast members and race against your friends to be the ultimate winner. Clock up your speed and complete levels or race in Multiplayer challenge mode.

Awesome Features:

- Insane Screen Sharing Multiplayer Challenge Mode
- Create your own Tournaments and Race against your Facebook Friends
- 5 Super Cool Cast Members, Granny, Zombie, Indy, Lara and Punk
- 25 Awesome Mine Racing Levels through Underground Caverns
- Check out your score on GameCentre Leaderboards, see if you're the best
- Wanna just race? Then head for Storymode play and rev up that mine cart!

Find Us online:

Twitter @ RisingHighApps
